<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Portal Banner">5127b6e3db40dc10fa11cf2414961920</child><cloned>2020-04-14 17:28:31</cloned><last_validated>2020-04-14 17:28:31</last_validated><parent display_value="Carousel">cf1a5153cb21020000f8d856634c9c3c</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>standard</category><client_script/><controller_as/><css/><data_table>sp_instance_carousel</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list>interval</field_list><has_preview>false</has_preview><id/><internal>false</internal><link/><name>Carousel</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[data.slides = $sp.getRelatedList('sp_carousel_slide','carousel');]]></script><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-08-02 18:57:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>cf1a5153cb21020000f8d856634c9c3c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>67</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Carousel</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">44efe504db350010fa11cf2414961981</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_cf1a5153cb21020000f8d856634c9c3c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-13 09:10:52</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div class="pull-in">
  <uib-carousel interval="options.interval">
    <uib-slide ng-repeat="slide in ::data.slides" active="slide.active">
      <div class="container">
        <a href="{{::slide.url}}" title="Open carousel item">
          <img ng-src="{{::slide.background}}" style="margin:auto; width:100%;" role="presentation">
        </a>
      </div>
    </uib-slide>
  </uib-carousel>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>organize.henrique</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-14 17:28:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>9d27b6e3db40dc10fa11cf2414961923</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>5127b6e3db40dc10fa11cf2414961920</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITSM Service Portal" source="x_gmeps_itsm_servi">334ae627dbc85c105c1163901496192f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITSM Service Portal">334ae627dbc85c105c1163901496192f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_9d27b6e3db40dc10fa11cf2414961923</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>organize.henrique</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-14 17:28:31</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
